Description: 
This application implements a command called "DispEntInfo"  to demonstrate the use of the CAcUiDialog class.

To run the sample:
Please use Visual Studio 2017 to open the solution called "Samples.sln" and switch to the configuration that matches with the ZWCAD versionï¼Œthen build the application.

To use DspEntInfo.zrx:
1. Start ZWCAD and open a new drawing and draw some entities.
2. Run APPLOAD command and load the DspEntInfo.zrx file in the output directory.
3. Execute the "DispEntInfo" command and click the "Select entity" button on the dialog box to select a entity, and the dialog box will display the basic information of the selected entity.
